comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

issue.body:
New type of YouTube ads is blocked by our filters. If that does not help, try using our script by following the instructions below.

---

Please enable AdGuard Extra in AdGuard settings (for app users).

---

Browser extension users should install `AdGuard Extra` script into `Tampermonkey` extension.

`AdGuard Extra` download link:
https://userscripts.adtidy.org/beta/adguard-extra/1.0/adguard-extra.user.js

After install `Tampermonkey`, change these options like on screenshot:
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8361299/68199152-23c17800-ffc6-11e9-99f2-13643aa771ae.png)

# Creating the pull request

> Please include a summary of the change and which issue is fixed\
> If the related issue does not exist in our repository, please create it before making pull request\
> It is highly recommended to use our [Web Reporting Tool](https://kb.adguard.com/en/technical-support/reporting-tool) instead of creating an issue on GitHub directly\
> Please note, that we verify every pull request manually, so it may take time to apply it

## Prerequisites

### To avoid invalid pull requests, please check and confirm following terms

- [x] This is not an ad/bug report;
- [x] My code follows the [guidelines](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md) and [syntax](https://kb.adguard.com/general/how-to-create-your-own-ad-filters) of this project;
- [x] I have performed a self-review of my own changes;
- [x] My changes do not break web sites, apps and files structure.

## What problem does the pull request fix?

### If the problem does not fall under any category that is listed here, please write a comment below in corresponding section

- [ ] Missed ads or ad leftovers;
- [ ] Website or app doesn't work properly;
- [ ] AdGuard gets detected on a website;
- [ ] Missed analytics or tracker;
- [ ] Social media buttons — share, like, tweet, etc;
- [x] Annoyances — pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc;
- [ ] Filters maintenance.

## What issue is being fixed?

### Enter the issue address

https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/125823

### Add your comment and screenshots

#### If possible, a screenshot of a page or application should not be cropped too much. Otherwise, it is not always clear where the element is located

0. **DO NOT** upload screenshots with sexually explicit material on GitHub directly.\
 Instead, upload it to a third-party image hosting and post the link to it without preview (!) here.\
 Also, mention if the link leads to NSFW content;

1. Add screenshots of the problem. You can drag and drop images or paste them from clipboard

    Use `<details> </details>` tag to hide screenshots under the spoiler;

2. Describe the issue in detail until it is absolutely clear from the screenshot what the problem is

    You can also indicate any other information that you think the developers should know.

**Warning:** Please remove personal information before uploading screenshots!

1. Your comment

### Terms

comment.body:
Tymczasowe rozwiązanie:
```
ewybory.eu#@#[id^="adv-"]:not(#adv-settings)
```

@MajkiIT Mógłbyś proszę spojrzeć?
Ta reguła:
```
~biblio.com,~milionczesci.pl,~dizibox.com,~2dehands.be,~ru,~ua,~www.pudelek.pl,~btdb.eu##[id^="adv-"]:not(#adv-settings)
```
z listy `Official Polish filters for AdBlock, uBlock Origin & AdGuard` powoduje, że zawartość strony jest ukryta.

@DandelionSprout  Could you please take a look.

issue.title: e.mail.ru

labels.name: Extra
labels.description: Issues, related to AdGuard Extra extension

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
### ВНИМАНИЕ

Пользователям программы для `Windows`, `macOS` или `Android` нужно включить расширение `AdGuard Extra` в настройках программы.

---

Пользователям браузерного расширения нужно установить [расширение AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra#how-to-install-adguard-extra) либо скрипт `AdGuard Extra`(этот вариант может не везде срабатыавать). 

<details><summary>Установка скрипта  "AdGuard Extra" в расширение "Tampermonkey"  :</summary>

Для установки скрипта понадобится браузерное расширение-скриптоприёмник `Tampermonkey`

Ссылка на `AdGuard Extra`
https://userscripts.adtidy.org/beta/adguard-extra/1.0/adguard-extra.user.js

После установки скрипта нужно будет зайти в настройки `Tampermonkey`, включить режим эксперта, переключить режим встраивания на `мгновенный` и перезапустить расширение:
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8361299/62641343-07248e00-b94c-11e9-9775-9854a7922889.png)

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8361299/62641299-f7a54500-b94b-11e9-8a83-885d89abbeec.png)

</details>

comment.body:
Не повторяется с вашими настройками.
Попробуйте выключить и снова включить контент-блокеры в настройках Сафари, а также обновить фильтры Адгарда.
Важно не закрывать окно Адгарда при обновлении фильтров в течение 30-60 секунд, иначе iOS прервёт процесс применения фильтров.

AdGuard for Android

Website or app doesn't work properly

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://yandex.by](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fyandex.by) ### Comment Username: @angelokofficial > почему-то на яндексе в сафари не блокируется реклама. первый скриншот - гл страница яндекса, второй - яндекс картинки. смена фильтров не помогает. AdGuard DNS тоже не блокирует там рекламу. в сафари все разрешения для AdGuard даны, в настройках Safari все пункты для AdGuard также отмечены. реклама блокируется везде, но не на яндексе почему-то. > > пробовал также установить сторонний RU AdList https://easylist-downloads.adblockplus.org/advblock.txt, но это также не помогло, хотя на ПК с расширением AdGuard никаких проблем. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://reports-img.adguard.com/TmhR3Fo.png)
Screenshot 2 ![Screenshot 2](https://reports-img.adguard.com/UWe4q42.jpg)
### System configuration Information | value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard for Safari v4.4.0(954) Browser: | Safari Filters: | Ad Blocking:
AdGuard Base,
AdGuard Mobile Ads,
EasyList

Language-specific:
AdGuard Russian Other extensions used: | только adguard

comment.body:
### ВНИМАНИЕ

Пользователям программы для `Windows`, `macOS` или `Android` нужно включить расширение `AdGuard Extra` в настройках программы.

---

Пользователям браузерного расширения нужно установить [расширение AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra#how-to-install-adguard-extra) либо скрипт `AdGuard Extra`(этот вариант может не везде срабатыавать). 

<details><summary>Установка скрипта  "AdGuard Extra" в расширение "Tampermonkey"  :</summary>

Для установки скрипта понадобится браузерное расширение-скриптоприёмник `Tampermonkey`

Ссылка на `AdGuard Extra`
https://userscripts.adtidy.org/beta/adguard-extra/1.0/adguard-extra.user.js

После установки скрипта нужно будет зайти в настройки `Tampermonkey`, включить режим эксперта, переключить режим встраивания на `мгновенный` и перезапустить расширение:
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8361299/62641343-07248e00-b94c-11e9-9775-9854a7922889.png)

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8361299/62641299-f7a54500-b94b-11e9-8a83-885d89abbeec.png)

</details>

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Annoyance) [https://www.applesfera.com/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.applesfera.com%2F) ### Comment > Something broke lately with AdGuard Annoyances Filter. All other filters work perfectly (Ads, Social Widgets, Trackers, etc). I verified it one by one. The problem is exclusively with AdGuard Annoyances Filter. And only with the Content Blocker, the Advanced Blocker works fine (Advanced rules). My guess would be that one rule with unsupported syntax managed to bypass the Safari Filter Converter (one one rule contains unsupported syntax, the whole filter stops working). Perhaps this has to do with AdGuard recent change where the Annoyances Filter was split into different categories. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://reports-img.adguard.com/nHwVr1y.png)

issue.title: Unchecking "Enabled on this site" does not disable the annoyances filters for the site
issue.body:
@piejanssens commented on [Tue Jun 07 2022](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardForSafari/issues/718)

<!--  As an open-source project with a dedicated but small maintainer team, it can sometimes take a long time for issues to be addressed so please be patient and we will get back to you as soon as we can.
-->

### Prerequisites

Please answer the following questions for yourself before submitting an issue. **YOU MAY DELETE THE PREREQUISITES SECTION.**

- [X] I am running the latest version
- [X] I checked the documentation and found no answer
- [X] I checked to make sure that this issue has not already been filed

### Issue Details

<!--- Please include all relevant details about the environment you experienced the bug in -->

* AdGuard for Safari version: 1.11.4
* Environment name and version: Safari 15.5 (17613.2.7.1.8)
* Operating System: macOS 12.4.0
* Filters you use in AdGuard: ads, privacy, annoyances (EasyList Cookie List, I don't care about cookies, AdBlock warning removal list), language-specific (NL)


### Expected Behavior
<!-- A clear and concise description of what you expected to happen. -->
If I uncheck "Enabled on this site", I expect any AdGuard to no longer affect the site in any way.

### Actual Behavior
<!-- A clear and concise description of what actually happened. -->
Some filters are still being applied. I am certain that this is a bug in AdGuard as I can get the wanted effect by disabling the AdGuard all-together via the "Pause AdGuard for Safari" option.

### Screenshots
<!-- If applicable, add screenshots to help explain your problem. -->

<details><summary>Screenshot:</summary>

<!--- drag and drop, upload or paste your screenshot to this area-->

</details>

### Additional Information
<!-- Add any other context about the problem here. -->

---

@Birbber commented on [Wed Jun 08 2022](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardForSafari/issues/718#issuecomment-1150112013)

@piejanssens Hi! Could you give an example of the webpage so I could check it on my end?

---

@piejanssens commented on [Wed Jun 08 2022](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardForSafari/issues/718#issuecomment-1150120107)

Hi @Birbber,

1. Enable the "I don't care about cookies" annoyance filter.
2. Visit https://www.era.be/nl/te-koop
3. Notice you can't scroll
4. Disable AdGuard on the site
5. Notice you still can't scroll...
7. "Pause AdGuard for Safari"
8. Accept the cookies
9. Notice you can scroll

> breaking the page navigation (scrolling

Not reproduced. Please make a screenshot of content blockers in iOS settings.

issue.title: Stealth mode breaks HCaptcha

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

labels.name: A: Waiting for data
labels.description: Waiting for more information from the user

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Android

### AdGuard version

4.0 nightly 34

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Chrome

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

Everywhere 

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Annoyances filter, AdGuard Experimental filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

Hide your search queries, Send Do-Not-Track header, Remove X-Client-Data header from HTTP requests, Block WebRTC, Block Location API

### Add your comment and screenshots

Seriously your web reporting tool is awful - URL fields keep deleting and replicating contents on mobile.

Anyway

HCaptcha is broken with stealth mode on. I know the filter required to fix it but not how to add it so here it is:
```
@@||hcaptcha.com$stealth,important
```

Without that HCaptcha challenges don't show at all

### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

issue.title: AdGuard Base static filter blocks audio player
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

AdGuard Base 2.2.42.22

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

other(specify in comment below)

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://thepressproject.gr/piso-selides-tis-28is-iouliou-2022/

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter, AdGuard Annoyances filter, Filter unblocking search ads and self-promotion, EasyList Italy, Greek AdBlock Filter, Fanboy's Annoyances, Online Malicious URL Blocklist, Fanboy's Anti-thirdparty Fonts, BarbBlock

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

Using Pale Moon browser 31.1.1, uBlock Origin v1.16.4.30 (["legacy" version](https://github.com/gorhill/uBlock-for-firefox-legacy)) with the listed filters. Windows 10 21H2 x64.

Enabling Adguard Base makes the audio player below disappear:<details>

![Working](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/7165208/182207857-499d4895-492c-4934-8088-d95e6b7a24c3.png)</details>

Audio player removed:<details>

![Not working](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/7165208/182208438-897b4d9f-08af-4f02-a9f2-f767152f71df.png)</details>

Disabling cosmetic filtering on uBO or AdGuard Base entirely, brings the player back. In the uBO Logger, I think the culprit is this but I am not 100% sure:<details>

![Adguard Base issue](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/7165208/182209101-49f9561b-d38e-4576-b127-d2d7cf6a37b1.png)</details>

Thanks for any help.

### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

issue.title: AdGuard Base static filter blocks audio player
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

AdGuard Base 2.2.42.22

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

other(specify in comment below)

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://thepressproject.gr/piso-selides-tis-28is-iouliou-2022/

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter, AdGuard Annoyances filter, Filter unblocking search ads and self-promotion, EasyList Italy, Greek AdBlock Filter, Fanboy's Annoyances, Online Malicious URL Blocklist, Fanboy's Anti-thirdparty Fonts, BarbBlock

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

Using Pale Moon browser 31.1.1, uBlock Origin v1.16.4.30 (["legacy" version](https://github.com/gorhill/uBlock-for-firefox-legacy)) with the listed filters. Windows 10 21H2 x64.

Enabling Adguard Base makes the audio player below disappear:<details>

![Working](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/7165208/182207857-499d4895-492c-4934-8088-d95e6b7a24c3.png)</details>

Audio player removed:<details>

![Not working](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/7165208/182208438-897b4d9f-08af-4f02-a9f2-f767152f71df.png)</details>

Disabling cosmetic filtering on uBO or AdGuard Base entirely, brings the player back. In the uBO Logger, I think the culprit is this but I am not 100% sure:<details>

![Adguard Base issue](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/7165208/182209101-49f9561b-d38e-4576-b127-d2d7cf6a37b1.png)</details>

Thanks for any help.

### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition
